text: The American Airlines Center (also known as the AAC) is a multi-purpose arena. It is in the Victory Park neighborhood, near downtown Dallas, Texas. It is currently used by the Dallas Stars and the Dallas Mavericks. It is also used for concerts and entertainment. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Site Category:Sports buildings in Texas Category:Sports in Dallas Category:2001 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Texas Category:Dallas Stars
title: American Airlines Center
